name: Twitter
description: Twitter is more like a way for you to ~~stalk~~ follow me than to actually communicate with me, but maybe that is your goal...

name: GitHub
description: Most of what I work on (at least professionally) is proprietary, but some of my more recent side projects can be found on GitHub.

name: LinkedIn
description: Just FYI: I probably won't "add you to my professional network" unless you actually write your own message in the request.

name: DeviantArt
description: I'm mostly inactive on DeviantArt these days, except for my [deviantART Filter project](projects/deviantart-filter/), but most of portfolio lives on here.

name: Dribbble
description: Another community in which I have unfortunately been scarce of late. Hopefully I'll have some design work to start posting there in the future.
